==Spring==
* Marriage of [[Huor]] and [[Rían]].<ref>{{GA|216|note}}</ref>
* [[Húrin]] is setting out for [[Barad Eithel]].<ref>{{CH|1}}, p. 50</ref>

==Midsummer==
* '''The Fifth [[Battles of Beleriand|Battle of Beleriand]]: [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]]''' (''Battle of Unnumbered Tears''). The [[Union of Maedhros|army]] of [[elves]], [[men]] and [[dwarves]] are betrayed by [[Ulfang]] causing their defeat. The armies suffer heavy losses in the face of [[Morgoth]]'s [[orcs]], [[dragons]] and [[balrogs]].<ref name="Fifth">{{S|Fifth}}</ref>
* [[Fingon]] dies in battle with [[Gothmog (balrog)|Gothmog]], Lord of [[Balrogs]].<ref name="Fifth"/>
* [[Azaghâl]] dies in battle with [[Glaurung]].<ref name="Fifth"/>
* Deaths of [[Huor]], [[Hundar]], [[Haldir (Chieftain of the Haladin)|Haldir]], [[Gelmir (son of Guilin)|Gelmir]], [[Uldor]], [[Ulfast]], [[Ulwarth]], [[Borlach]], [[Borlad]] and [[Borthand]].<ref name="Fifth"/>
* [[Húrin]] and [[Gwindor]] are captured. [[Húrin]] refuses to tell [[Morgoth]] the location of [[Gondolin]]; Morgoth taunts Húrin at the [[Hill of the Slain|Haudh-en-Ndengin]].<ref>{{UT|Words}}</ref>
* [[Turgon]] succeeds [[Fingon]] as [[High King of the Noldor]] in [[Middle-earth]] and returns to [[Gondolin]].<ref name="Fifth"/>

==Late==
* Birth of [[Tuor]]. [[Rían]] commits Tuor to the care of the elf [[Annael]].<ref name="GA">{{GA|251}}</ref>
* Rían goes to the [[Hill of the Slain|Haudh-en-Nirnaeth]] and dies.<ref name="GA"/>
* Death of [[Glóredhel]].<ref>{{WJ|14}}, p. 234</ref>
* [[Túrin]] sent to [[Doriath]] by his mother [[Morwen]].<ref>{{CH|4}}, p. 70</ref>
